definition: to put forward a suggestion (to sb in a senior position)/to offer a word of advice
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: Candid advice to the president by his colleagues is inhibited.
sentences.chinese: 总统的同僚向他进言的渠道被阻塞了。

sentences.english: I will speak to the mayor in regard to city plan ning.
sentences.chinese: 我要向市长就城市规划问题进言。

sentences.english: We remonstrated against cruelty to animals.
sentences.chinese: 我们向对动物的残酷行为提出进言。

sentences.english: And some persons advised the educational problems to the Qing government after they come back.
sentences.chinese: 还有部分人在回国后就教育问题向清政府进言。

sentences.english: A word to the wise usually starts an argument.
sentences.chinese: 向智者进言常常引来一场争论。

sentences.english: Candid advice ot the President by his colleagues is inhibited.
sentences.chinese: 总统的同僚向他进言的渠道被阻塞了。

definition: to offer advice/to make a suggestion
(of a court official) to present a memorial to the emperor (old)
courtier's or minister's form of address for the current Emperor
to make a suggestion/to state (one's views, ideas etc)/suggestion/advice/idea
the most senior minister of many kingdoms or dynasties (with varying roles)/prime minister
member of a monarch's inner ministerial circle (old)
